title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 634.4 - Limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 634.4 - Limitations

State Regulations

This Part applies to refunds returned to customers after
the effective date of these rules. No telephone corporation shall be required
to pay interest on customer overpayments that are refunded within 30 days after
such overpayment is received by the telephone corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
634.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
